commit message: Initial commit. Actually, it's ready :-)
Optimized to run on older devices.
Do not require main activity. Always run in background.
Implemented Main Activity for first boot.
Added ability to have preferences.
Added preference for enabling only available networks.
Added almost all code for checking if BSSID is known (only needs actions added to notification to fill the whitelist).
Implemented BSSID-based association.
App cleanup
Remove notification on next scan.
Make blocked BSSIDs global (not per-SSID).
Used fragments instead of activities.
Code cleanup.
Create copy of list when saving to sharedPreferences, because new information is otherwise discarded.
Again fixing double requests for same network.
Hard dependency on API level 16 because of notification actions.

- Make sure networks are re-enabled when service is disabled.
- Disable for hidden SSIDs.
Translated to Dutch.
New logo
Handle Wi-Fi being turned off while performing policy checks.
Remove Log lines when releasing.
Release config.
More translations, and forced big notifications.
Add all BSSIDs currently in range for network if allowed at location
New and fancy icon.
Added code for survey filling.
Scaled icons.
Fixed Gradle warning.
Cancel previous intents when creating a new one to prevent Yes/No buttons not working.
Added ability for older android versions to change permissions.
Compatibility now for API level 11 and up.
New icon.
Made app release-ready.
Disable protection against evil access points by default.
Rewording of evil access points.
Added notice to bottom of preferences.
Switchbuttons with shorter titles.

Allow user to clear the list of trusted/untrusted hotspots.
Revert back to CheckBoxPreferences because of bug in Android.
Ask for confirmation before removing all hotspots.
Bumped version number.
Refactored and added comments, to make sure that others can understand the source.

Made notifications less jittery (by only removing them if no new notification was created, and updating otherwise).
New icon for notifications.
Added resources for new notification icon.
Initial commit
Added build file suitable for open sourcing.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/brambonne/privacypolice
Added configuration files needed to get the project running in Android Studio / with Gradle.
Android 5.0 fix: make sure to connect to a recently enabled network.
Bumped version code for new Play Store release.
Handle intents that do not contain all necessary parameters.
Updated build files
Included the possibility for Google Analytics in the code. Not using it for now, might be used for future research, *but only after explicit permission from the user*
Included the possibility for Google Analytics in the code. Not using it for now, might be used for future research, *but only after explicit permission from the user*
Allow probe requests for cloaked (hidden) networks. See code for rationale.
New icons. Thanks to Matthäus Kubitza (reddit: MatthaeusK) for the design and for releasing the resources in the public domain!
Moved disclaimer for hidden SSIDs to the access point safety checking function.
Moved to switch preferences instead of checkbox preferences because Google fixed https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=26194
Prettier askPermission dialog (instead of full activity).
Updated launcher icons.
Refactoring.
Disabled all analytics code for the time being.
Added license to comply with F-Droid requirements.
Added README.
Added Portugese translation
Correctly close tags in Portugese translation (fixes bug #3)
Removed old icon
Added German translation.
Changed German translations.
Unified punctuation

Merge pull request #7 from scento/i18n-german

German translation by Wenzel Pünter.
Added support for viewing the list of trusted/untrusted SSIDs

Added icons for visible networks in SSID list.
Added some comments.
Added new to-translate strings to German and Portugese translations.
Added icons indicating network availability.
Created superclass for all network management-related activities.
Modified style for manager activities.
Added lists showing the trusted access points for each network.
Refresh the ListActivities if the preferences are cleared.
Show signal strength in the network manager.
Show SSID as title for the MAC manager activity.
Added the ability to remove individual access points for a network.
Added 'TO-TRANSLATE' strings for de and pt.
Generalized storage of blocked and allowed access points.
Renamed 'access point' to 'hotspot' in the UI.
Color blocked networks red in the network list.
Allow removal of blocked MAC addresses.
Refresh the network list when it is brought to the foreground.
More closely emulate the stock Android Wi-Fi picker in the network list.
Only add networks with at least one remembered BSSID to the SSID list.
Reworded known hotspots, making clear that this is an advanced feature.
Added multiple user support.
Added multiple user support.
Removed the notice about PrivacyPolice not working with cloaked hotspots, since it does work with those from now on.
Storing blocked BSSID preferences with BBSSID// prefix for consistency.
Use 'PrivacyPolice' as tag for logging.
Removed multiple user support, as the way for handling this code is currently not supported by Google.
Prepare for new release.
Updated Dutch translation.
Added french translation

Merge pull request #10 from satbadkd/master

Added French translation (courtesy of Pierre Duchemin)
Fix incorrect escaping in French translation
Use non-breaking space to avoid weird wrapping

Merge pull request #16 from Fiouz/Fix_French_translation

Fix French translation (thanks to Fiouz!)
Prepare for intermediate translation release.
Added support for Android 5.1 and up.
Build target changed to SDK 22.
Added ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION permission to be able to access scan results in Android 6.0+.
Added Android 6.0 support.
Markdown'd the README, because it's 2015 and it seems that this is a hip thing to do.
Updated comments.
Added notice about location permission.
improved french translation
improvedimprovement up to date

Merge pull request #25 from M2ck/patch-1

improved french translation (thanks M2ck!)
Added material style for API level 21 and up.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:brambonne/privacypolice
Precede apostrophes by '\' in French translation
Log an error to console when location access is unexpectedly unsupported

Added a WakelockHandler class which does nothing except making sure that Android (>6.0) doesn't suspend our operation. Will trigger an alarm approximately every 15 minutes, but adheres to Android's doze mode.
Cleaned up WakelockHandler class.
Gracefully handle the case when location access is disabled
Wait for a bit before trying to reassociate, in order to work around phones that don't start associating right away
Added placeholders for translations
Moved runtime permissions check to LocationAccess class.
Released version 2.2
Show location notice that can redirect to location settings, in order to inform the user.
Allow user to disable location notification
Updated translations
Small new release.
Made location notice readable on smaller screens (or with bigger fonts)
Version bump

Location access only needs to be enabled on Android 6.0 and up.
Fixed https://github.com/BramBonne/privacypolice/pull/35
Fixed typo
Added Italian translation

Merge pull request #38 from marco-scavuzzo/master

Added Italian translation. Thanks to Marco Scavuzzo for the effort!

Merge pull request #37 from nicolas-raoul/patch-1

Fixed typo thanks to Nicolas Raoul
Show network trust level in network manager activities, also for networks that are not available
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
